info.name: NO ADS Facebook 2017
info.description: Recently Updated | Removes Ads, Sponsored Posts, Suggested Posts, Suggested Pages, Suggested Groups, "Popular live video" and "People you may know" on Main Feeds and Sidebars.
info.additionalInfo: Main Feeds Hides* Suggestions from News Feed (Suggested Posts, Games, Pages, etc), Sponsored post with the format "[Friend] likes [Sponsored Page]", "Popular live video" and "People you may know" *Since Facebook made these (almost) indistinguishable from your feeds I've come up with a little trick that may work for you. The suggestions will still appear in the News Feed, taking space, but they will be completely white. Sidebar Removes (properly) ADS, Suggested groups and Suggested pages from sidebars on Main Feeds, Groups Pages, Messages Page and Modals. Check out my other styles: Clear Pinterest Clear LinkedIn Clear Youtube Clear Feedly Clear Twitter

data.title: Does what it says, works like a charm! Thank you!
People You May Know showing again
